fn main() {
    let mut count = 0;
    'counting_up: loop {
        println!("count = {count}");
        let mut remaining = 10;

        loop {
            println!("remaining = {remaining}");
            if remaining == 9 {
                break;
            }
            if count == 2 {

            }
            remaining -= 1;
        }

        count += 1;
    }
    println!("End count = {count}");
}

fn is_three_power(mut n: i32) -> bool {
  if n > 0 && n % 3 == 0 {
    n /= 3;
  }

  n == 1
}

}
